abstract: Relational Investors, the activist hedge fund run by Ralph V. Whitworth, disclosed on Tuesday that it had taken a stake in PepsiCo worth about $609 million.
snippet: Relational Investors, the activist hedge fund run by Ralph V. Whitworth, disclosed on Tuesday that it had taken a stake in PepsiCo worth about $609 million.
lead_paragraph: Relational Investors, the activist hedge fund run by Ralph V. Whitworth, disclosed on Tuesday that it had taken a small stake in PepsiCo worth about $609 million.

headline.main: Whitworth’s Relational Takes Stake in Pepsi

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
